parameters.name: Description
parameters.value:
Check for below Scenario from Application Data Capture
1)Scenario:Verify Remarks and Reason to Reconsider the counter offer is mandatory while Reconsidering the COL
2) Product Name : Aarogya Plus
3) Policy Plan :  Family Floater
4) Business Type : New Business
5) Members : 2A (Self + Spouse)
6) Highest Highest Member Age Band  :  
Self : 38 age ,SI : 2Lac,Premium  17800
Spouse :22 age ,SI : 2Lac,Premium  17800
Health loading % for self : 10% - gout
Health loading % for self : 20% - All type of fracture
7)Tenure : 1 Years
Level 1 : Refer to UWR
M1 and M2 : Accept with loading
level 2 : Counter offer
level 3: Reconsider the counter offer letter

8)Trigger point:  "Remarks" and "Reason to Reconsider the counter offer" field should be mandatory
9) VP: While reconsidering the counter offer letter ,""Remarks" and Reason to Reconsider the counter offer field should be mandatory
